document_data.name: Morningstone House
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Morningstone House''' was the local shrine to [[Lathander]] found in the small town of [[Asbravn]]. Both were situated in an out-of-the-way stretch of the [[Sunset Vale]], in the valley where the [[Dusk Road]] intersected with the [[Uldoon Trail]].

It was one of several smaller shrines, including those to [[A House of Joy|Lliira]] and [[Goldcoin House|Waukeen]], that encircled the larger, yet rundown [[House of the Suffering God|temple]] of [[Ilmater]].
